title: When you are Shen, and you see a very close battle in bot lane

replies.body:
But then the other Shen comes in too.
http://www.gif-king.com/files/uSers/gif-king-7697612449654699d434889edf8f707f.gif
No enemy Shen taunts you before your ult goes off then he ults down bot while /all lol

Then the taunt on the first Shen ends and he taunts the second one ending his ult.

It's funny how champions are their own biggest counters.
incept-shen
Shenception*
wtf 2 shens?
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2011/09/lip_licker.gif

{{champion:58}} Let me know when you are going in, I'll lock down Shen while you guys take them out.

{{champion:51}} *silence*
{{champion:53}} *silence*

{{champion:98}} *Runs back from lane towards tower*


{{champion:58}} *pings mia*

*Double kill!*

{{champion:51}} WTF why no stop Shen or call mia?!?

{{champion:58}} ... I will find you, and I will hurt you.

fuck you shen.
just let me dive your fucking adc.

seemed relevant
Actually, it does not.

When I ping and am waiting for a Shen ult to turn a fight around and he keeps farming... But I see his ult is up... 

https://media.giphy.com/media/yoJC2vCUdqPXUk2bmg/giphy.gif
And when he shows up, misses his taunt and ends up giving the enemy ADC an extra kill.
Also, that's how he taunts Tham Kench ! :DDDDD
And then {{champion:30}}
